item.title: Setting up ox-hugo
item.description: To set up ox-hugo, I followed the official quick start page. On MacOS: brew install hugo brew install go mkdir blog && cd blog For theme, I could not get hugo mod init to work, so I used the git clone approach. As of the time of writing, I have used the hello-friend-ng theme, which recommends the github submodule installation: git submodule add https://github.com/rhazdon/hugo-theme-hello-friend-ng.git themes/hello-friend-ng To conclude the theme setup, I have copied the recommended settings to my config.
